nodes.text: The Gree Repair Sphere was an example of technology used by the inhabitants of the Gree Enclave. This element of Gree technology were strange devices that were referred to by their users as "tool-sphere repair-mothers" that were capable of repairing damage done to power conduits.
During the Cold War, one such piece of equipment was used to restore the power conduits within The Works after Coruscant was invaded by the Sith Empire.
